content.question: Toward the end of the final paragraph, the author begins a sentence with “Yet it must not be supposed” in order to

choices.label: issue a disclaimer about the validity of his observations
highlight an assumption that he initially made about emigrants
signal a shift in his perspective on his fellow emigrants
warn his audience against the folly of judging others

content.answer: signal a shift in his perspective on his fellow emigrants

skill.text: Skill 7.A: Explain how word choice, comparisons, and syntax contribute to the specific tone or style of a text.
